hypothesis_content.title: Low Gas Regime Precedes Altcoin Breakouts
hypothesis_content.statement: When ETH gas fees remain below 20 Gwei for 3 consecutive days during NEUTRAL regimes, selected altcoins (AVAX, GRT, CRV) experience 8-15% breakouts within the next 5 trading days as capital rotates from idle to productive deployment.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Sustained low gas fees indicate reduced network congestion and potential accumulation phases. This creates favorable conditions for altcoin breakouts as traders deploy capital that was previously sidelined due to high transaction costs.
entry_conditions: ETH gas fee (24h avg) < 20 Gwei for 72 consecutive hours
At least 2 of 3 target alts (AVAX, GRT, CRV) trading within 5% of 20-day low
hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Altcoins fail to rally >5% within 5 days despite sustained low gas and neutral regime conditions
